thread.section_title: www.itunesandpsncards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.itunesandpsncards.com | www.itunesandpsncards.com
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text:
i want US iTunes - even though i live elsewhere
personal decision - and fact that i'm an expat, do not want local language on my devices. by decision. want English.
tried this particular seller with caution - usual initial fear of being conned.
they accept PayPal - oh great. a safety net. a buffer. no need to share my credit card with them.
made a small purchase - worked fine. actually, the seller even bothered to contact me and ask about discrepancy between country of my PayPal account, and country of my residence. so they care and apply thinking.
then made more purchases - worked perfectly every time
once got a code that did not redeem - the seller sent me new code, right away
by now this is my go to resource for fuelling my iTunes.
fast. efficient. just works.
and yes, you pay a commission - but it's still way cheaper than hopping on a plane and flying to US, to buy bunch of iTunes cards ;-)
